content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I understand that you are interested in the rental price and would like to discuss this with me further. To begin, can you please provide me with your preferred rental range for a 25 square meter apartment in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I see, thank you for your interest in my apartment. However, as a landlord, my goal is to maximize my profits and I am not able to offer the lowest possible price for this apartment. I am willing to negotiate with you to reach a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price. Can you provide me with your budget for renting a 25 square meter apartment in New York? This will help us to find a price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a budget of 1000 Euros per month.

I hope we can come to an agreement on the rental price. If not, I will have to look for another apartment.

I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know what you think.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for sharing your budget with me, Hassan. I understand that you are looking for an affordable option, and I am willing to work with you to find a rental price that fits within your budget.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would be happy to offer you a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. This price takes into account the costs of utilities and other expenses associated with renting the apartment.

I hope this rental price works for you, Hassan. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to ask. I am flexible and willing to negotiate to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
